structure.unit: ARTICLE II. MIAMI-DADE FIRE AND RESCUE SERVICE DISTRICT

law.catch_line: Municipalities Contracting with District for Additional Services.

text.section:
Sec. 18-31. Municipalities Contracting with District for Additional Services.
Any municipality may contract with the District for the delivery of additional fire and rescue services. Any services provided by the District in accordance with any such contract shall be in addition to the fire and rescue services provided under.
